capability.name: Financial Compliance
capability.definition: Financial Compliance capability tracks and manages the resolution of detected non-compliance financial activities and instances, ensuring corrective actions are properly monitored and resolved.
capability.role: Track the resolution of detected non compliance finance activities and instances
capability.example: A business unit misses its first qtr targets and reacts with corrective actions that are tracked

key_features.name: Non-compliance detection tracking
key_features.description: Enables non-compliance detection tracking to support financial compliance capability tracks and manages the resolution of detected non-compliance financial activities and instances, ensuring corrective actions are properly monitored and resolved
